name: Syre
description:
Entry for the "Not the Brisbane 48hr Game Jam". Topic: Submerge,Air, Sculpture.

1 man team, I spent around 21 hours all up.
Requires DX11

I spent a bit too long on the player mesh and animation, and got a little too deep into making a water fog model.

I definitely didn't finish to the scope I wanted to achieve; at a minimum I would've liked a bit more ROI on the collection mechanic (eg, bring sea-life back to the areas you unlock), and a bit more spectacle on the unearthing of the statues.
